Wolfblade::

She ordered some hot energon soup and a cup of liquid energon. "Hmm, 
this seems nice. However, per my programming, I'm still in the mood 
for a good hunt and some raw meat. Deer is particularly nice."  She 
sat down and looked at Malice. "OK, you have my curiousity peaked. 
What's the deal?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice looked over the avalible menu as he crunched on the small 
piece of energon he had from eariler.
> "I've been chewin' on this raw stuff.  This high energy, near toxic 
energon does please the palette, but I'm for a hot meal.  You pick."
> 
> shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> Wolfblade:
> 
> She followed Malice into the mess hall. "Hmm, what's on the menu? 
> grilled energon cubes, sauteed predacon with a side order of liquid 
> energon on ice? Hmm, sounds like it's really yummy. Perfer raw meat 
> or fresh energon. How about you?"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
> <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > Wolfblade:;
> > 
> > She finished and looked at Elita. "Uh, yeah. Well, I'll fight to 
> the 
> > end for the little one. But, kids aren't my cup of energon. You 
> know 
> > how it is. Wars leave little time for things like that."  She 
> looked 
> > back at Elita and sighed. Part of her wanted something like 
> > that,someday. The other part was deathly afraid of something so 
> > fragile and smaller than her own form.  She looked at 
> Malice. "Let's 
> > head to the mess hall and talk."
> >

glad

> > > > > on

our 
> > > team.

I

Sorry."
